description.p: The intuitive writing app for everyone, from students to developers!

ul.li: Easy-to-use markdown editor.
Notebooks and tags, quickly find and organize your notes
Your work is saved automatically as you write, you will never loose your work!
Plugins: such as embedding YouTube videos and setting text color
Export as PDF and Markdown files
Cross-Note Links to quickly reference other notes
3 Beautiful app themes to help you create the best writing environment,
And much more!
Tags! Tags is the new and hot way to organize your notes! Add them from the new Page Info toolbar!
When you add a new tag to a note, Notes-Up will add them to the Sidebar to quickly filter all notes using the tag!
Talking about the Sidebar, it has a fresh new look, and a new All Notes button to show all your notes in the pages list!
Your note information now appears in the new Page Info Toolbar. It shows where is it and when it was created and updated
You can now edit the title of the note without making it the first line of the file from the Page Info Toolbar!
Move pages to another notebook with a simple button from the Page Info Toolbar
You can now link to other pages from within the viewer!
Write in a paper-like theme as well as a new dark mode.
Exporting Markdown files is now possible form within Notes-Up!
And a lot of work went into making Notes-Up better on the inside! This will speed up the development of future versions!
Fixed problem where the notes folder would not be re-created if it was deleted, preventing the app from opening again...
Tooltips with shortcuts now use the new style
Fixed a problem where Notes-Up would forget the sidebar size.
The styles on the HelpBox have been updated for Juno
If you delete the empty page created when you make a notebook, it will not re-appear
And other small bug fixes
Notes-Up is now available in elementary OS Juno!
Icon updated to use the new elementary color palette
Trashed pages show up in the pages list grayed out
Added translations for Italian and Japanese
Code cleanups and more!
Pages are better summarized when they have markdown symbols
When applying styles to the text, it will automatically wrap around it properly
You can now move Notebooks
Fixed some errors from exporting, and some other bugs
Notes-Up is now translated to Lithuanian, French, Portuguese and Czech!
A huge thanks to the translators, and the new contributors! You guys rock!
Notes-up now checks your spelling while you type! No more excuses for misspelled words in your homework ;)
The title of the app now displays your current note and notebook
Prevent crash when closing the preferences dialog
Make sure to load all plugins
